description:
How are Linux users so easily able to distro hop as much as some of them do?  How are some Linux users able to reinstall their distro and be back up and running so fast?

CHECK OUT THESE VIDEOS:
► https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r4CyUAFMUcY (GitLab Basics)
► https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tBoLDpTWVOM (Dotfiles)
► https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=84gHe3WQmNQ (Nextcloud Server Installation)
► https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i6LuV7Pl2YU (Syncthing)
► https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tEnnEhziLn8 (Move Your Home Directory To A Second Drive)
